select fvisitno, fprogrscd, fvisitedt /*[schedule.selectVisitorForExpire]*/ from tvisitinfo where fprogrscd in ('A', 'C', 'T') /*신청,승인,카드수령*/ and left(fvisitedt, 8) <= date_format(date_add(now(), interval -1 day), '%Y%m%d')
mapper.update: update tvisitinfo /*[schedule.updateVisitorForExpire]*/ set fprogrscd = 'X' , fmodid = 'SYSTEM' , fmoddt = substr(date_format(current_timestamp(3),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s.%f'),1,23) where fprogrscd in ('A', 'C', 'T') /*신청,승인,카드수령*/ and left(fvisitedt, 8) <= date_format(date_add(now(), interval -1 day), '%Y%m%d')

update tvisitinfo /*[schedule.updateVisitorNotComeIn]*/ set fprogrscd = 'X' /*기간만료(신청,승인)*/ , fmoddt = substr(date_format(current_timestamp(3),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s.%f'),1,23) , fmodid = 'SYSTEM' where fvisitno in (select fvisitno from tvisitinfo where fprogrscd in ('A', 'C') and fvisitsdt < date_format(current_timestamp(),'%Y%m%d%H00'))

update tvisitinfo /*[schedule.updateVisitorNotGoOut]*/ set fprogrscd = 'Z' /*카드미반납(카드교부)*/ , fmoddt = substr(date_format(current_timestamp(3),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s.%f'),1,23) , fmodid = 'SYSTEM' where fvisitno in (select fvisitno from tvisitinfo where fprogrscd = 'T' and fvisitedt < date_format(current_timestamp(),'%Y%m%d%H%i'))

update tvisitinfo /*[schedule.updateVisitInfoForExpire]*/ set fprogrscd = (case when fprogrscd = 'T' then 'Z' else 'X' end) , fmoddt = substr(date_format(current_timestamp(3),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s.%f'),1,23) , fmodid = 'SYSTEM' where fvisitno in (select fvisitno from tvisitinfo where fprogrscd in ('A', 'C', 'T') and fvisitedt < date_format(current_timestamp(),'%Y%m%d%H%i'))
mapper.select: select curdate() cf_curdate, keep_unit, keep_num , case when keep_unit = 'day' then date_add(curdate(), interval (-1)*keep_num day) when keep_unit = 'month' then date_add(curdate(), interval (-1)*keep_num month) when keep_unit = 'year' then date_add(curdate(), interval (-1)*keep_num year) end as cf_duedt /*해당 날짜보다 작은 날짜를 삭제*/ from gatelog_set_tb where use_yn = 'Y' and curdate() between keep_sdt and keep_edt
